meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Sugar-Salem School District – Home of the Diggers

meta.content:
School Board
The School Board meetings are open to the public. The next board meeting is on January 8th at 7:00 PM. The next board meeting is on February 12th at 7:00 AM.

div.p:
The School Board meetings are open to the public.
The next board meeting is on May 13th at 7:00 AM.
Powerschool is our student information system. Use it to check student grades, lunch balances, and attendance.
Click here to see our academic and activities calendars–including the calendars for sports.
Click for information about the school lunch program. To see the lunch menus click here.

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_5 fusion-builder-column-5 fusion-one-fifth fusion-column-last 1_5

div.p: The counselor’s office is your place for help with schedules, college preparation, and for help with student’s emotional needs.

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_2_3 fusion-builder-column-6 fusion-two-third fusion-column-first fusion-no-small-visibility 2_3

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

a.aria-label: School to Remain Online For The Rest of the School Year

h4.a: School to Remain Online For The Rest of the School Year

div.p: The Sugar-Salem School District Board of Trustees met Wednesday morning and determined to remain online for the remainder of the school year. The last day of School will be May 22nd. Click for details.

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

div.p: Mr. Bradshaw has released a statement on the progress of the new middle school. Click to read the full statement.

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

div.p: The Sugar-Salem School Board will be holding a special board meeting April 15th at 7:00 AM. Click for digital attendance details!

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

a.aria-label: Sugar-Salem School District Statement on Coronavirus

h4.a: Sugar-Salem School District Statement on Coronavirus

div.p: Sugar-Salem School District is closed until at least April 20th due to Covid-19. Click for full details. (Last updated March 27th.)

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

div.p: Glenn Miller Night's live performance has been cancelled due to Covid-19. Click to read the full details on meal and livestreaming of the event. No performance or meal pickup will be available Saturday!

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

a.aria-label: TSA Wins Big at State Competition

h4.a: TSA Wins Big at State Competition

div.p: TSA students won big at their state competition! Ryder Schone was elected as one of five state TSA officers and Austin Robinson won the Top Dog Award, given to the top student at the competition regardless of school size. Click for full results!

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

div.p: Mr. Parker will be taking a group of students to Europe in the Spring of 2021! E-mail him for more details at pparker@sugarsalem.com!

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

a.aria-label: SSHS Boys Basketball: State Tournament Information

h4.a: SSHS Boys Basketball: State Tournament Information

div.p: The boys basketball team has won their second straight state title with a dominant 72-54 performance over Kimberly! Hadley Miller and Crew Clark combined to light the nets on fire with 41 points.

article.class: post fusion-column column col col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12

div.p: Join us in celebrating Kindness Week! Click for ideas of how to show kindness to those around!

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_3 fusion-builder-column-7 fusion-one-third fusion-column-last 1_3

div.p:
Sugar-Salem School District #322
105 West Center
P.O. Box 150
Sugar City, ID 83448
(208) 356-8802
We strive to make our website accessible to everyone. If you have found a problem with this website, please contact our webmaster at jgee@sugarsalem.com.
